titles: A tragoedie or dialoge of the vniuste vsurped primacie of the Bishop of Rome, and of all the iust abolishyng of the same, made by master Barnardine Ochine an Italian, [and] translated out of Latine into Englishe by Master Iohn Ponet Doctor of Diuinitie, neuer printed before in any language
author: Ochino, Bernardino, 1487-1564.
Ponet, John, 1516?-1556.
publisher: [By N. Hill] for Gwalter Lynne dwellyng on Somers kaye by Byllynges gate],
notes: Publisher's name and address from colophon; printer's name from STC.
The uncorrected state; [A]2v ends: The lorde Protector.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Papacy --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
